actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice.

official_title: A resolution relative to the expenses incurred by the representatives of the Senate who attended the funeral of the Honorable Clifford P. Case, late Senator from the State of New Jersey.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay from the contingent fund the actual and necessary expenses incurred by Senate representatives who attended the funeral of the Honorable Clifford P. Case.

titles.title: A resolution relative to the expenses incurred by the representatives of the Senate who attended the funeral of the Honorable Clifford P. Case, late Senator from the State of New Jersey.
